law.catch_line: Unauthorized use of manufacturer's brand or name.
law.text: No dealer or merchant shall make or apply or cause to be made or applied to any parcel or package any kind or character of label bearing the brand or name of any manufacturer without the written authority of the manufacturer.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1280a-1.
